outputs.output_descr: Reduced loss of lives/livelihoods and developmental assets to natural and human-induced disasters as an outcome of proactive mechanisms and strategic partnerships responsible for more effective policy formulation, preparedness and response planning, information sharing and implementation of cross-sectoral disaster risk reduction activities.
